data.name: Cube World
data.detailed_description:
Cube world [/] is a simple puzzle game, similar to Tetris. In the game, you can operate aswd to move the small squares left and right, make a position and put the same colors together
The playing method of cube world is very simple. As long as you fill a line with squares, you will eliminate the full line.
Like this box, after it is put down, you can directly eliminate the second line.
It seems that this kind of box is not in line with this, but after it is put down, it will eliminate one line, so there will be no holes and block the box below.
There is also this T-shaped box. Although it can not fill all the gaps below, it seems to cause holes, but we look carefully. After putting it down, it will also eliminate the two-line box. The gap at the bottom is also exposed after elimination and will not be blocked.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win 7/8/10
  • Processor: i3
  • Graphics: i3 2100
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Joshua scs
